headline: PE Firm Madison Dearborn to Buy Aon's Wealthspire, Most Wealth Business for $2.7B
summary: Private equity firm Madison Dearborn will now control Wealthspire Advisors, Fiducient Advisors and Newport Private Wealth as a consolidated firm overseeing about $560 billion in client assets, the majority of which are retirement plan assets.

headline: Aon Signs Definitive Agreement to Sell Significant Majority of NFP's Wealth Business to Madison Dearborn Partners
summary: Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, today announced that it has signed a definitive agreement to sell a significant majority of NFP's wealth business – Wealthspire Advisors, Fiducient Advisors, Newport Private Wealth and related platforms – to Madison Dearborn Partners, LLC ("MDP"), a leading private equity investment firm based in Chicago.

raw.headline: Aon Signs Definitive Agreement to Sell Significant Majority of NFP's Wealth Business to Madison Dearborn Partners
raw.summary: Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, today announced that it has signed a definitive agreement to sell a significant majority of NFP's wealth business – Wealthspire Advisors, Fiducient Advisors, Newport Private Wealth and related platforms – to Madison Dearborn Partners, LLC ("MDP"), a leading private equity investment firm based in Chicago.

headline: Aon signs $2.7 billion deal to divest majority of NFP's wealth business
summary: Aon had acquired privately held NFP in April 2024 from Madison Dearborn in a $13 billion deal, aiming to expand in the fast-growing middle-market for insurance brokerage, wealth management and retirement advisory services.  Analysts believed wealth management was a non-core business for Aon, which has traditionally focused on insurance brokerage and risk advisory.
